participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Friendly and compassionate, enjoys helping others and has a strong sense of community.
participant_1.background: I volunteer in a homeless shelter. I am a professional wrestler. I enjoy being around people. In my spare time, I do volunteer work.

participant_2.name: Alexis
participant_2.personality: Reflective and resilient, often overcoming challenges and maintaining a positive outlook despite struggles.
participant_2.background: I now live in the city. I take many medications and some of them make me see things. I am a recovering alcoholic. I grew up on a farm.
